00013 #define GLAZIERY_BUTTON(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    text, image) \
00015    Button * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new Button) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    variable->setText(text); \
00023    if (image != NULL) \
00024       variable->setImage(image);
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_BUTTON_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, autoResizing, \
00027    text, image) \
00028    GLAZIERY_BUTTON(variable, area, groupField, text, image) \
00029    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py)));
00030 
00031 #define GLAZIERY_BUTTON_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00032    text, image) \
00033    GLAZIERY_BUTTON(variable, area, groupField, text, image) \
00034    variable->setAutoResizing(false); \
00035    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00036       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00037
